original: Is NOT a Lover of §Y$WHO$§!
Is a Lover of §Y$WHO$§!
Has fewer spouses than
Number of spouses at least
Has fewer consorts than
Number of consorts at least
Has fewer lovers than
Number of lovers at least
Any Lover
Difference in Age
Any Claim
Is a Pacifist
Is NOT a Pacifist

My beloved [GetFromRelation] is showing every sign of being my reborn [GetFromReincarnationRelation] [From.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]. Little [From.GetFirstName] often speaks of [From.GetPossPronoun] old friends and family, even naming many correctly.
translation: 种种迹象表明，我亲爱的[GetFromRelation]是由我的[GetFromReincarnationRelation][From.Reincarnation.GetFirstName]转世而来的。小[From.GetFirstName]经常谈起[From.GetPossPronoun]亲朋好友，甚至可以精准地说出他们的名字。

original: Conscript Merchant Ships
With holdings overseas, my realm has a quite a bit of merchant shipping that can be conscripted in times of war - for a tidy sum of gold, of course...
translation: 随着海外地产的增加，我国有相当数量的商船可以在战争期间被征召——当然，这需要支付那么一点点金子……

original: Has NO overseas holdings
Has overseas holdings
This unit has been out of supplies for
translation: 该单位缺乏补给已经有

original: Host Game Settings
Samrat Chakravartin
Samrajni Chakravartin
Relations
§Y$WHO$§W and §Y$OTHER$§W become close friends.\n
The friendship between §Y$WHO$§W and §Y$OTHER$§W ends.\n
§Y$WHO$§! and §Y$OTHER$§W become bitter rivals.\n
The rivalry between §Y$WHO$§! and §Y$OTHER$§W ends.\n
Glad to Take Hostage
Convert to Local Culture ([Root.Capital.Culture.GetName])
I catch myself thinking in the [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] language all the time. I govern the [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] people of [Root.Capital.GetName], but am I truly one of them?
translation: 我发觉自己总是以[Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]语思考。我统治着[Root.Capital.GetName]的[Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]人，但是我是否真的是他们当中的一员呢？

original: Convert to Local Religion ([Root.Capital.Religion.GetName])

The §Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetName]§! people in §Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert and embrace the glory of §Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetRandomGodName]§!...
translation: 我被§Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§!深切并狂热信奉着§Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetName]§!的人民打动了，这件事诱使着我转变了信仰。为了§Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetRandomGodName]§!的荣耀！

original: India
Ganges is the embodiment of all sacred waters in Hindu mythology and is personified in the goddess Ganga. As you live fairly close to this great river, your Upadhyaya suggests that you make a visit.
translation: 恒河是印度教神话当中所有神圣水域的具现，它被拟人化为恒河女神。鉴于你住的地方距离这条伟大的河流相当近，你的亲教师建议你前去拜访它。

original: I will go.
I have no time.

You have arrived at the banks of the Ganges. You enter a temple at the banks of the river, avoiding the throng of the common pilgrims. The sacred waters offer a ritual of purification and will strengthen your link to the divine.
translation: 你到达了恒河河岸。避让着途中挤的满满的普通朝圣者们，你进入了岸边的一座庙宇。圣水不但使你的心灵得到了净化，还加强了你同神之间的联系。

original: I descend into the water and Ganga washes away my sins.
translation: 我步入恒河水中，女神洗净了我的罪孽。

original: Your court guru doesnt' talk much. He gives strange advice and has also been caught drinking on several occasions. You're beginning to doubt that he's a real guru.
translation: 你的宫廷上师话不多。他不但提供着古怪的建议，还在好几个场合中被抓到喝酒。你开始怀疑他是否是一位真正的上师。

original: I must investigate this.
Who cares?

You've had your court guru watched for several weeks. He secretly drinks and smokes herbs, he keeps sneaking out to pleasure houses in disguise, and spends the money he gets from donations on playing cards.
translation: 你已经监视你的宫廷上师好几个星期了。他私下里抽烟喝酒，一直乔装打扮偷摸去风月场所，还拿大家捐给他的钱去打牌。

original: I must confront him.
Actually, that's my kind of guru.
translation: 事实上，那正是我想要的上师。

original: As you confront your court guru over his habits, he breaks down and pleads for mercy: 'I confess, I'm an impostor. Please have mercy on me - I'm just a common man trying to make a living.'
translation: 当你把你的宫廷上师的恶习摆在他面前时，心理防线已经崩溃的他乞求你的宽恕：「我坦白，我是个冒牌货。求求您放过我——我只是个想要活命的普通人啊！」

original: It's the dungeons for you!
Leave my palace now. Your charade is over.
translation: 现在离开我的宫殿，你的表演结束了。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be a drunkard.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此酗酒恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: I shall strive to improve.
Leave me alone.
No one speaks to me like that!

Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be such a hedonist.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此沉湎于享乐恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be known as an impaler.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，以拷打爱好者而臭名远扬恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be so lecherous and lustful.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此淫荡恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be gluttonous.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此暴食恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be so greedy.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此贪婪恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be consumed by envy.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此嫉妒恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be so wroth.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此易怒恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to have so much pride.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此傲慢恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be so arbitrary in [Root.GetHerHis] rule.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此专断恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be so cynical.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此愤世嫉俗恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be so prone to cruelty.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此残暴恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to be a duelist and engage in violence for sport.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，整天决斗、忙于暴力恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to hunt innocent animals for sport.' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，整天猎杀无辜的生灵恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Your court guru has come to see you: 'I must speak to you of an important matter, [Root.GetLordLady] [Root.GetFirstName]... We must always seek wisdom and try to walk the righteous path in life. It is not fitting for a noble ruler to show so little trust in those around [Root.GetHerHim].' He bows and looks at you in silence.
translation: 你的宫廷上师来觐见你：「我有要事相告，[Root.GetFirstName][Root.GetLordLady]……我们必须始终追求智慧并行走在人生的正道上。您身为一位高贵的统治者，如此不信任他人恐怕是不合适的。」语毕，他深深地鞠躬，看着你，不再说话。

original: Priests from a local Hindu temple have approached you, asking for donations. They need to expand the temple with a new building in order to accomodate the growing number of worshipers.
translation: 本地的印度教寺庙的祭司来拜访你，请求你的捐助。他们需要扩建寺庙以容纳与日俱增的信徒。

original: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Shiva statue.
translation: 我会帮你。记得再加一座大型湿婆雕像。

original: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Vishnu statue.
translation: 我会帮你。记得再加一座大型毗湿奴雕像。

original: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Brahma statue.
translation: 我会帮你。记得再加一座大型梵天雕像。

original: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Kali statue.
translation: 我会帮你。记得再加一座大型迦梨雕像。

original: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Ganesha statue.
translation: 我会帮你。记得再加一座大型象头神雕像。

original: I will help you. Make sure you put in a large Ganga statue.
translation: 我会帮你。记得再加一座大型恒河女神雕像。

original: I will help you with a small donation.
I'm sorry, I don't have the funds.

Monks from a local monastery have approached you, asking for donations. They need to accomodate the rising number of worshipers and still have enough provisions to maintain their other work and studies.
translation: 本地修道院的教士来拜访你，请求你的捐助。他们需要足够的空间容纳与日俱增的信徒以及维持他们的日常工作和学习。

original: Give them gold.
Give them food.
This is none of my concern.

There have been increasing complaints from merchants in the nearby town lately. It seems a number of naked Jain ascetics have taken to sit and preach in the main square. The merchants say they understand the need to respect other religions, but the naked ascetics are driving away customers and upsetting people's sensitivities.
translation: 最近来自附近城镇的商人们的抱怨与日俱增。似乎有一些赤身裸体的耆那教苦行者们正静坐在主广场上向他人讲道。商人们说他们懂得尊重其他宗教，但是苦行者们赤身裸体的行为不但赶跑了他们的客人，还让民众内的敏感者们感到不安。

original: Why do you bother me with this petty nonsense?
translation: 你怎么能拿这种鸡毛蒜皮的无稽之谈打扰我？

original: We will ask the ascetics to move to a less prominent location.
translation: 我们会让苦行者们搬到一处不那么显眼的地方。

original: My soldiers will throw these heathens out town!
translation: 我的战士们会把这些异教徒从城镇中扔出去！

original: The merchants are unhappy
Jains in your realm are upset.
translation: 你领内的耆那教众被惹恼了。

original: Gambler
Sacrilegious Acts
This sacrilege will be widely known.
translation: 这种亵渎行为将被广而告之。

original: A priest from the local temple has arrived, asking speak with you: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], the holy elephants at the temple are all sick. However, we have learned that there is a healer in a neighboring province who is famous for healing ailing elephants. He is, however, most expensive...'
translation: 一位来自本地庙宇的祭司来到了你的宫廷，他说道：「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，庙中那些神圣的大象们都得病了。不过我们了解到临近的省份中有一位专治病象的名医，可是他开的价格最高……」

original: How unfortunate for you.
I shall pay for it.
My [Root.GetLordLady], messengers have arrived from the great [From.GetFullName]. It seems [From.GetSheHe] has decided to honor you with the grandest of all gifts, a white elephant!
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，伟大的[From.GetFullName]给你送来了消息。[From.GetSheHe]好像已经决定给予你一份荣耀，将一头作为最高级别礼物的白象送给你！

original: I will accept this gracious gift.
translation: 我会接受这份崇高的礼物。

original: I will not accept it.
You will need to build a proper stable for your white elephant. It is a unique and holy animal and must have an abode fitting its status.
translation: 你需要为你的白象建造一座舒适的住处。它是一种独特而神圣的动物，必须得到与其地位相称的居所。

original: I shall build it a house of fine woods and gold.
translation: 我会为其花重金良木打造一所房屋。

original: A normal elephant pen will do.

My [Root.GetLordLady], the guards keeping watch over your white elephant report that they have caught some trespassers. It seems they are members of a rather strange local Ganesha cult, and they have been stealing the white elephant's dung for worship.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，看守白象的守卫们报告称他们抓住了一些入侵者。似乎他们来自一个本地的信奉象头神的相当奇怪的教派，而且他们还把白象的粪便偷回去祭拜。

original: Kill the blasphemers!
No harm done, give them the droppings as a gift.
translation: 他们人畜无害，给他们点粪便当礼物吧。

original: Let them work in the stables. We will pay them with dung.
translation: 让他们在大象的房屋里工作，我们付给他们粪便。

original: Your white elephant has still not gotten used to its new housing, and it seems restless and bored. Last night it got worse, it started kicking around and going on a rampage, almost tearing the whole place apart.
translation: 你的白象到现在都没适应它的新居所，而且它似乎越发焦虑不安。昨晚的情况更糟，他开始暴走，四处乱踹，几乎毁掉了整栋建筑。

original: Just repair it.
I've had enough, return this cursed gift.
translation: 我受够了，把这份受诅咒的礼物还回去吧。

original: Sell the damned thing.
This stupid animal needs to die - now.

My [Root.GetLordLady], there is a problem with your white elephant. Yesterday, it broke out from its stable and ran out into to the nearby fields. Once there, it immediately attempted to mate with several elephants - this desire may actually have been the reason for its escape.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，你的白象出了点问题。昨天，它逃离了住处并且跑进了附近的田间。它刚一到那就立刻开始和几头大象交配——这种性需求也许就是它逃离的原因吧。

original: From now on, make sure it gets weekly 'exercise'.
translation: 从现在开始，要保证它每周都得到「锻炼」。

original: I've had enough, return the lecherous beast.
translation: 我受够了，把这头淫荡的畜生还回去吧。

original: Hmm, maybe we could sell it for breeding.
translation: 嗯……也许我们可以用它下崽卖钱。

original: Kill this elephant. Now.

If you truly wish to kill the White Elephant, you must decide how to proceed, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Whichever method we employ, we should try to make it look like an accident so as to avoid insulting the person who gave it to us.
translation: 如果你真的想要杀掉白象，就必须想想该怎么做，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。无论我们采用什么办法，都应该让它看起来像是死于意外，使得赠送大象的人不会怪罪于我们。

original: Poison it.
Let's just starve it to death.
Push it over a cliff.
I don't care who's insulted. Send in the soldiers with lances.
translation: 我才不在乎谁会怪罪我。让士兵们戳死它。

original: The caretakers poison the white elephant's drinking water. The elephant soon starts to wail in pain and becomes quite sick. It is a slow poison, and it takes several days for the beast to expire. Everyone is very concerned and very sad at this sudden 'illness'. No one suspects that you had the elephant poisoned.
translation: 看护人在白象的饮用水里下了毒。大象很快变得虚弱并且开始痛苦地哭号起来，这是一种慢性毒药，过了好几天才让大象断气。大家对此事非常关切并对这种突如其来的「病症」感到异常沮丧。但没人怀疑你给大象下了毒。

original: Excellent.

The caretakers poison the white elephant's drinking water. The elephant soon starts to wail in pain and becomes quite sick, vomiting blood and dying within minutes. Most people think it very strange that such a healthy animal suddenly died so quickly. Rumor quickly spreads that you had it poisoned.
translation: 看护人在白象的饮用水里下了毒。大象很快变得虚弱并且开始痛苦地哭号起来，几分钟内就七窍流血而死。大部分人都对一头如此健康的动物死的那么突然感到蹊跷。很快就有流言称你给大象下了毒。

original: Unfortunate.

You instruct the caretakers to stop feeding the elephant. The animal gets progressively weaker and weaker until one morning it is found dead. You have your servants and medics complain loudly about the animal having been sick and refusing to eat. Everyone is sad, but no one suspects foul play.
translation: 你授意看护人停止给大象喂食，大象日益衰弱直到某天早上死去。你的仆人和医生们大声地抱怨着大象很虚弱并且拒绝进食。每个人都很悲伤，但没人想到有人使坏。

original: Excellent.

You instruct the caretakers to stop feeding the elephant. The animal gets progressively weaker and weaker until one morning it is found dead. Word gets out, however, that your servants had stopped delivering food to the stable and soon it is common knowledge that you starved the elephant to death.
translation: 你授意看护人停止给大象喂食。大象日益衰弱直到某天早上死去。不过你的仆人停止给大象喂食这件事传了出去，不久之后，你把大象饿死这种说法已经人尽皆知了。

original: Unfortunate.

You arrange to bring the white elephant on an official procession very near some high cliffs. At the right moment, the guards prod the elephant with spears and drive it over the cliff, and it falls to its death. You swiftly have the guards spread the news of the terrible accident. Everyone is shocked, but no one suspects your involvement.
translation: 你把白象安排进一支路过几处悬崖的队伍中。时机一到，卫士们就戳刺大象令其坠崖，之后它就摔死了。你赶快让守卫把这个噩耗传了出去。大家都感到震惊，但没人认为你参与了此事。

original: Excellent.

You arrange to bring the white elephant on an official procession very near some high cliffs. At the right moment, the guards prod the elephant with spears and drive it over the cliff, and it falls to its death. Unluckily, however, some hunters passing by witnessed the whole incident, and rumor of your bloody deed swiftly spread throughout the realm.
translation: 你把白象安排进一支路过几处悬崖的队伍中。时机一到，卫士们就戳刺大象令其坠崖，之后它就摔死了。然而，不幸的是，几个路过的猎人目睹了事件的全过程，不久有关你这次滥杀行为的流言就传遍了全国。

original: Unfortunate.

You send twenty soldiers armed with lances into the white elephant's stable. They attack and swiftly kill the animal in a few very noisy and bloody moments. Everyone knows it was done on your direct orders, and that's exactly the way you want it to be.
translation: 你派遣了二十名身背长矛的战士来到白象的居所。经过了短暂的血腥和喧哗，大象受伤而死。大家都知道他们是受你的指使，但这种结果却正是你想要的。

original: It had to be done.
The white elephant seems to be a lot calmer now, and hasn't broken anything or injured anyone in quite a while. It seems that perhaps our troubles with it are over.
translation: 白象似乎较之前冷静多了，很长的一段时间里它再也没伤及人或物。看来麻烦解决了。

original: Let's hope so.
A group of wandering Buddhist monks have come to visit the province. They are staging impressive shows of acrobatic unarmed fighting techniques in the villages.
translation: 一队云游僧人来到了你的省份。他们在村里上演了令人印象深刻的徒手搏击表演。

original: Those guys are fast as lightning!
They had better not teach those things to my peasants.
translation: 他们最好别把那些东西教给农民们。

original: I think I know who it was...

A strange man has approached you, seeking audience with you. He claims he is an 'engineer' and he wishes to build a boat that can travel under water and sail it up the Indus. All he needs is a sponsor for the project. If you help him, he will name the boat after you - 'a you-boat', he jokes, smiling nervously.
translation: 一个陌生人接近了你，希望得到接见。他声称自己是一位「工程师」，希望能建造一艘能够在水下航行的船，并用它在印度河中逆流而上。而他现在唯一缺少的就是本工程的赞助费了。如果你帮助了他，他将以你来命名该船——「你号」，他紧张地笑着。

original: Interesting. How much money do you need?
'You-boat?' Get out. Now.

The 'engineer' spent many days building his underwater boat. In the end it was finished and he set out, submerging the craft to the sound of amazed murmuring from the great crowd gathered along the shore. A faint trail of bubbles could be seen as the boat navigated underwater up the river.\nAlas, he was never seen nor heard of again.
translation: 「工程师」费了很多天工夫来建造他的水下船只。最终他完工并且出发了，伴随着在海滨聚集的大批人群发出的唏嘘声，他将船只逐渐下潜。当船在水下航行时，水面冒出了一缕微弱的气泡。\n哎，他从此销声匿迹了。

original: Hmm, what have we learned from this?
translation: 嗯……我们从这件事中学到了什么呢？

original: It is rumored that a sacred yogi has mastered the art of levitation, and that he can be seen at a marketplace nearby.
translation: 有传言说一位圣瑜伽士掌握了浮空术，我们可以在附近的集市上找到他。

original: I must see this!
I have no time for superstitions.

You arrive at the marketplace. There is a large crowd gathered around the yogi. He does indeed seem to be levitating above the ground, eyes closed. Someone mutters that he has been still like that for several hours.
translation: 你来到了市场。瑜伽士周围聚集了大批人群。他双眼紧闭，看起来确实浮到了空中。有人小声说道他已经保持那个状态好几个小时了。

original: Interesting.
Fascinating! I must donate money to this holy man.
translation: 善哉！我要资助这个神职人员。

original: Let's poke him and see what happens.
translation: 咱们戳下他，看看会发生啥。

original: I think I'll give him a hard shove.
You leave the levitating yogi, pondering the magical mysteries of these holy men.
translation: 你离开了施展浮空术的瑜伽士，思考着这些圣人的魔法奥秘。

original: The world holds so many fantastic things.
You poke the yogi. He blinks, then regains his composure.
translation: 你戳了下瑜伽士。他眨了眨眼，然后又回到入定的状态了。

original: Poke him again.
Leave him alone.
Give him a good shove.
The yogi opens his eyes, irritated. He steps down and leaves without a word. The rest of the crowd eyes you with disapproval.
translation: 修行者恼怒的睁开眼睛，他落到地面，一言不发地离开。剩下的人对你投以不满的目光。

original: What?

You take step back, then throw yourself forward, giving the yogi a forceful shove. He topples over with a frightened screech, hitting his head on the ground. The crowd stares in stunned silence at you and the yogi.
translation: 你后退一步，然后猛地向前推修行者。他发出一声惊恐的尖叫，然后脸着地。众人沉默在震惊之中。

original: I knew he was a fake!
An elephant has gone crazy and is running amuck in the town outside the castle. It has already killed several people - what shall we do?
translation: 这头大象已经疯了，在市集里横冲直撞已经撞死了几个人，我们该怎么办？

original: Send soldiers to kill it.
Try to capture it.
Several soldiers were severely injured, but they managed to kill the elephant. The animal died screaming, spilling a whole river of blood all over the street. The peasants are very upset.
translation: 几个士兵严重受伤，但是他们还是设法杀死大象。伴随着大象的尖叫声，它死在街上，血流成河。这让农民们非常不安。

original: Well, at least the town is safe now.
translation: 好吧，至少现在这里安全了。

original: The soldiers managed to lure the elephant to a safe area and then kill it with spears.
translation: 士兵们设法吸引大象到安全区域，然后用长矛杀死它。

original: Ah, good.
It was impossible to capture the crazed beast. It killed several more people, flattened a couple of buildings and then ran off into the countryside.
translation: 疯狂的大象难以捕捉。它杀了几个人，摧毁了几栋建筑，然后跑到农村去了。

original: Unfortunate.
A couple of veteran elephant handlers managed to snare and capture the elephant. It has been brought safely to the pens.
translation: 一些有经验的大象驯养员尝试去引诱捕捉那头大象。大象被安全地关到了围栏里面。

original: Excellent!

It seems that my interest in the Indian religions has come to the attention of one of their practitioners within the realm. We met and have had the most fruitful discussions about theology and other matters.
translation: 看起来我对印度宗教的兴趣已经引起了在这个领域的一位专家的注意。我们面对面地进行了一场关于神学以及其他事项的讨论，我受益匪浅。

original: I have made a friend!

You have received a visitor - an emissary from the famous university at Nalanda. He tells of you of the research and other work they do there and offers you a formal invitation to visit and see this marvel of Bihar.
translation: 你有一位客人——来自著名学府那烂陀寺的使者。他向你介绍了他们开展的研究以及其他工作，同时还正式地邀请你前往，去见证这个属于毗诃罗的奇迹。

original: Interesting - I will accept the invitation.
I don't have the time.
Nalanda

You have arrived at the magnificent University of Nalanda. It's a massive complex of red brick buildings, busy with a bustle of scholars and monks. You have been told that people come here from all over India and beyond in order to study and exchange ideas. The library has a huge amount of texts in every language known to man.\n\nIt's an impresssive place. You don't have much time to spend here, however, so you need to decide what to do...
translation: 你已经到达了宏伟的那烂陀学院。学院由大量复杂的红砖建筑群组成，繁忙的学者与僧侣让这片地方变得热闹。你已经得知这里的人们来自整个印度及印度之外的不同地区，他们来这里学习，交流思想。这里的图书馆拥有海量的由已知的所有语言写成的文献。\n\n这是一个让人毕生难忘的地方。但是，很遗憾你不能在这里逗留太久，所以你需要决定到底在这里做些什么……

original: I will focus on studying the architecture.
translation: 我将把重点放在这里的宏伟建筑上。

original: I think I will spend a few days in the library.
translation: 我觉得我要花上好些日子在图书馆里了。

original: I have come to receive religious instruction.
Become Samrat Chakravartin

An Indian ruler who manages to emulate Ashoka the Great and unite all the lands of India under [Root.GetHerHis] rule may claim the title of Samrat Chakravartin, Emperor of Emperors. This title embodies the concept of the ideal and universal world ruler in Indian tradition. Claiming it is a hard task, but living up to it may be even harder...
translation: 一个效仿阿育王的统治者，将印度所有的土地都纳入到[Root.GetHerHis]统治的人，可以宣称转轮圣王的头衔，换句话说，就是「万王之王」。这个头衔在印度的传统中象征着整个世界的理想统治者。对这个头衔的宣称是一个艰难的任务，要对的起它的威名则更为艰难……

original: Court Guru
the Leper
Peace
Tamil Band
Tamil
Marathi Company
Marathi
Marathi Band
Marathi
Bengal Company
Bengal
Bengal Band
Bengal
Rajput Company
Rajput
Rajput Band
Rajput
Church Opinion: $VALUE$
Spouse Opinion: $VALUE$
Attraction Opinion: $VALUE$
Dynasty Opinion: $VALUE$
Vassal Opinion: $VALUE$
Liege Opinion: $VALUE$
Other Faith Opinion: $VALUE$
Same Trait Opinion: $VALUE$
Religious Same Trait Opinion: $VALUE$
Opposite Trait Opinion: $VALUE$
Same Faith Opinion: $VALUE$
Ambition Opinion: $VALUE$
Has not already converted

Tempers flaring at the feast! A duel broke out between [FromFromFrom.GetFullName] and [FromFrom.GetFullName], and the ringing of steel on steel held the spectators captive for several intense moments.\n\n[FromFrom.GetFullName] lost but he suffered only minor wounds.
translation: 充满火药味的晚宴！在[FromFromFrom.GetFullName]与[FromFrom.GetFullName]之间发生了一场决斗，在这激情燃烧的时刻，钢铁与钢铁之间的碰撞让许多观众入迷。\n\n最后[FromFrom.GetFullName]虽然输掉决斗，但只是受了点轻伤。

original: Tempers flaring at the feast! A duel broke out between [FromFromFrom.GetFullName] and [FromFrom.GetFullName], and the ringing of steel on steel held the spectators captive for several intense moments.\n\n[FromFrom.GetFullName] lost and lies wounded on the ground.
translation: 充满火药味的晚宴！在[FromFromFrom.GetFullName]与[FromFrom.GetFullName]之间发生了一场决斗，在这激情燃烧的时刻，钢铁与钢铁之间的碰撞让许多观众入迷。\n\n最后[FromFrom.GetFullName]输掉决斗，重伤倒地。

original: Tempers flaring at the feast! A duel broke out between [FromFromFrom.GetFullName] and [FromFrom.GetFullName], and the ringing of steel on steel held the spectators captive for several intense moments.\n\n[FromFrom.GetFullName] lost and was horribly maimed.
translation: 充满火药味的晚宴！在[FromFromFrom.GetFullName]与[FromFrom.GetFullName]之间发生了一场决斗，在这激情燃烧的时刻，钢铁与钢铁之间的碰撞让许多观众入迷。\n\n最后[FromFrom.GetFullName]输掉决斗，并且重伤残废了。

original: Tempers flaring at the feast! A duel broke out between [FromFromFrom.GetFullName] and [FromFrom.GetFullName], and the ringing of steel on steel held the spectators captive for several intense moments.\n\n[FromFrom.GetFullName] was killed!
translation: 充满火药味的晚宴！在[FromFromFrom.GetFullName]与[FromFrom.GetFullName]之间发生了一场决斗，在这激情燃烧的时刻，钢铁与钢铁之间的碰撞让许多观众入迷。\n\n最后[FromFrom.GetFullName]不幸被杀！

original: Lately, you have been enganging in long philosophical conversations with [From.GetFirstNameWithNick], your court guru. You have been discussing Buddhism, and how you can become master over your desires and weaknessess and eliminate the suffering they cause in your soul.
translation: 最近，你一直与你的宫廷上师[From.GetFirstNameWithNick]探讨哲理。你一直在讨论佛教，以及如何成为克服欲望和弱点，并且消除它们对自己灵魂影响的大师。

original: I feel I have been helped by this!
It's no use!
Stop Drinking
Learn to Reject Empty Pleasures
Learn to Abstain from Excesses of the Flesh
Reject Cruelty
Learn Temperance with Food
Learn to Reject the Poison of Greed
Learn to Reject Envy
Learn to Reject Hate
Learn to Reject Pride
Defeat Fear
Mandir of
Vihara of
Derasar of
was offered up in sacrifice to the Gods by $KILLER$
Become Paragon of Enlightenment
[This.GetTitledFirstName] strives to improve [This.GetHerHis] [This.Religion.GetPietyName] and become enlightened, an inspiration to all of [This.GetHerHis] faith.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]广积善缘，努力提升[This.GetHerHis][This.Religion.GetPietyName]并欲修得大彻大悟，即对[This.GetHerHis]信仰的真正领悟。

original: Enlightened
Paragon of Enlightenment
Reply is sent to [From.GetFullName]
Change Religious Branch
This act violates the Jain doctrine of Ahimsa, or non-violence\n
translation: 这种行为违反了耆那教不害或者非暴力的教义。\n

original: Arrange a marriage with one of the most eligible potential spouses available.
translation: 安排与一个最合适的潜在配偶结婚。

original: §YDemesne too Big§!
Your demesne has §Y$NUM$§!/§Y$MAX$§! holdings, causing inefficient taxation, troop recruitment and resentment among your vassals.
translation: 你的直辖领拥有 §Y$NUM$§!/§Y$MAX$§! 块地产，这会降低你收取税金和征募部队的效率，并恶化你和你封臣之间的关系

original: Combat Modifier boost to Horse Archer Troops: $PERC$
Combat Modifier boost to Camel Mounted Troops: $PERC$
Combat Modifier boost to Elephant Mounted Troops: $PERC$
Some traveling merchants from Europe have arrived, seeking audience. They say they are from Venice and are on a long journey to reach the court of the Khan in in the far east.
translation: 一些从欧洲来的客商到达了你的领土来寻求顾客，他们说他们从威尼斯来，长途跋涉要去往遥远东方可汗的王廷。

original: Bring them before me, I shall speak to them.
translation: 带他们过来，我要见见他们。

original: These people do not interest me. Send them away.
translation: 我对这些人不感兴趣，送他们离开。

original: The merchants turn out to be brothers, going by the names of Niccoló Polo and Matteo Polo, and Niccoló's son Marco is also traveling with them. They petition you to provide an escort or guides for travelling east through your realm.
translation: 商人中出来一对兄弟，名叫尼科洛·波罗和马泰奥·波罗，尼科洛的儿子马可也与他们同行。他们恳请您能同行或是提供一个向导带领他们穿过你的领土。

original: I will provide seasoned guides.
I will provide seasoned guides and an armed escort.
translation: 我将提供老练的向导和士兵护送。

original: I'm sure they they can manage on their own.
translation: 我相信他们可以照顾好自己。

original: The Polo brothers thank you gratefully for your assistance. The next day they set off eastwards, strengthened by the aid you have provided.
translation: 波罗兄弟感谢您的帮助，第二天他们向东出发，再次感谢了你的及时出手。

original: I wish them a good journey.
The Polo brothers thank you for the audience. After spending the night in town, they set off again the next day.
translation: 波罗兄弟感谢你的招待。在城里过夜后，第二天他们又出发了。

original: What strange men.

You have received an unexpected visit! The Venetian merchants Niccoló, Matteo and Marco Polo have once again arrived at your court. They explain that they reached the Far East and are now returning after a successful voyage, wanting to stop at your palace to thank you for the valuable aid you offered when they last came by. And they have brought gifts.
translation: 你收到了一次意外来访！威尼斯商人尼科洛、马泰奥和马可波罗再次来到了你的宫廷。他们说，他们到达了遥远的东方，现又成功返回，想要停留在你的宫殿一晚，以感谢你上次提供的宝贵援助。这次他们带来了礼物。

original: Come, tell me tales of the East, my friends...
translation: 来吧朋友，告诉我东方的故事……

original: [From.GetFirstNameWithNick], your Court Guru, has been very keen to discuss matters of society and tradition with you lately. He expresses his views that the caste system is destructive and inhuman, and that men and women should be treated as equals. He even suggests that you become a champion of change by inviting the poor and the casteless to dine with you at your table.
translation: 你的宫廷上师，[From.GetFirstNameWithNick]，非常渴望与你讨论社会和传统的问题。他表达了他的观点，种姓制度是不人道的，男人和女人应该平等对待。他甚至建议你邀请穷人和没有社会阶级的人一起共餐。

original: What nonsense!
You are too wise for this age, my friend.
translation: 你拥有和你年龄不符的睿智，我的朋友。

original: Guru meditation

In order to reach inner peace and become a stronger and more harmonious person, you have been practising meditation with your guru, [From.GetFirstNameWithNick].

You have spent many moments reaching for your inner self, focusing, breathing, finding tranquility and harmony. You contemplate yourself within the universe, the universe within yourself, and your place in time and outside time.

And little by little, you are beginning to feel the difference.
translation:
为达到内心的平和，成为一个更有力而和谐的人，你跟你的上师 [From.GetFirstNameWithNick]一起练习冥想。

你花了很多时间去寻找内心的自己，专注，深呼吸，寻找内心的安宁与和谐。你在天地万物中思索着自身，也从自我出发去思考整个宇宙，思考着自身在时间线中跟超脱时间线的位置。

慢慢的，你开始感觉到了自身的改变。

original: Om bhur bhuvah svah.
Om mani padme hum.
Namo arihantanam.
Master Jungle Terrain.
Focus on War Elephants.
My [Root.GetLordLady], the province of [From.GetName] is in disarray. There are many reports of deep-set corruption among religious officials of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，[From.GetName]省份陷入混乱。很多情报告诉我们这里[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的宗教人士很腐败。

original: This is most worrying.
Good news, my [Root.GetLordLady]! Thanks to the resurgence of power of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, the corruption in the province of [From.GetName] has been eradicated.
translation: 好消息，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！由于[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的复兴，腐败已从[From.GetName]清除。

original: Excellent!
My [Root.GetLordLady], there are worrying news from the province of [From.GetName]. The [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is weakening and a strange local death cult have taken over several temples.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，这是来自[From.GetName]省份的令人担忧的消息。这里[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰消弱，地方异端宗教接管寺庙。

original: This is not good.
Good news, my [Root.GetLordLady]! Thanks to the resurgence of power of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, the power of the local death cults in the province of [From.GetName] has been eradicated.
translation: 好消息，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！由于[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的力量复兴，当地死亡邪教的势力已经从[From.GetName]根除。

original: By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], that is good news!

Bad news, my [Root.GetLordLady]! The people of [From.GetName] have long been losing faith in the ways of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. Now the majority of the province's population have switched to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith!
translation: 坏消息，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！[From.GetName]的人民已经对[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]失去了信心。现在他们投奔了[From.Religion.GetName]信仰！

original: Bad news indeed!

My [Root.GetLordLady], the county of [From.GetName] is experiencing much turmoil due to tensions between different religious factions of the [From.Religion.GetName] faith. It has gone as far as street battles taking place between supporters of different interpretations of [From.Religion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，由于[From.Religion.GetName]不同派别的斗争，[From.GetName]省份正在遭受动荡.对于[From.Religion.GetScriptureName]持不同解释的派别冲突升级，现已演变为街头械斗。

original: This is the work of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
Good news, my [Root.GetLordLady]! Thanks to the resurgence of power of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, the religious strife in the county of [From.GetName] has ebbed out.
translation: 好消息，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！多亏了[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的复兴，[From.GetName]的宗教冲突现已平息。

original: Finally they see the wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
Temple Corruption
